title: Why Shouldn't I Keep It? (3R105)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Maneuver: Spot a [Sauron] minion to discard Bilbo. The Free Peoples player may discard 2 Free Peoples conditions to prevent this.
Lore:	”'No, wait, it's here in my pocket. Isn't that… isn't that odd now?'”
Rarity:	R
